title: ProcyonRaccoon
author: ProcyonRaccoon
content: ProcyonCoin (PRCO)GPU mineable cryptocurrencyProcyonCoin use blockchain technologies created by Bitcoin and Ravencoin. ProcyonCoin is a fork from Ravencoin.ProcyonCoin is the coin used by raccoons !If a raccoon wants to afford a brand new video card, it needs a cryptocurrency that looks like it. With this video card, he can then participate in securing his currency by mining. What a vicious circle! The raccoon is happy!Coin name: ProcyonCoinCoin Ticker: PRCOTotal number of coins : 151 000 000 PRCOInitial block reward : 45 PRCOBlock halving : every 1 576 800 blocks (approx. 3 years)Algorithm : Kawpow (GPU)Average block time : 1 minutePremine : noneWebsite: https://www.procyoncoin.orgExplorer: https://explorer.procyoncoin.orgGithub: https://github.com/ProcyonCoin/ProcyonCoonCoinWallets: https://github.com/ProcyonCoin/ProcyonCoonCoin/releasesMiningPoolStats: https://miningpoolstats.stream/procyoncoinDiscord: https://discord.gg/s8tECFB4Exchange: Soon (What are you waiting to list us?Â   )https://i.imgur.com/xVLPtxv.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/E629VHP.pngBe Raccoon !

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: Block height and Network are extremely high. How much was mined before released to the public? Feels like a rug pull to me.

comments.author: somethingname1
comments.body: Is this coin open source or not thanks.

comments.author: ProcyonRaccoon
comments.body: The project is open source. There was no mining before the public release. Most miners arrived after pool listing.

comments.author: GeePeeU
comments.body: You say no premine, yet this ANN post comes 3 days after your first block.So it's safe to assume you are lying, and you premined 3 days worth of blocks.Â  (Unless you show proof of another announcement made before block 1)

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added Procyon (PRCO) to http://zpool.ca/algo/kawpow. See below for connection details.Fee only: 0.5% or lessPayouts are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine kawpow and get paid in PRCO:Code:-a kawpow -o stratum+tcp://kawpow.mine.zpool.ca:1325 -u PRCO_ADDRESS -p c=PRCO,zap=PRCO All of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for kawpow: 51325==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_

comments.author: CaVO32
comments.body: Quote from: GeePeeU on June 06, 2022, 01:43:56 PMYou say no premine, yet this ANN post comes 3 days after your first block.So it's safe to assume you are lying, and you premined 3 days worth of blocks.Â  (Unless you show proof of another announcement made before block 1)At least the first block is 45 coins here unlike many who really did premine their coins. Maybe, he announced this to his close friends or colleagues first, so they mined those few days before publicly announcing this project. Anyway, the project is another meme coin. So it is up to the user if he will put some resources into this like mining this coin and hope that one day, it will get listed in at least 1 exchange. But if you want certainty, better go to established networks. We always have our option not to get involve, if you feel you are just wasting your time. This is the good thing in crypto, you can always choose the project you want to support with. And it is your own picking where you would want to divert your resources to.
